underlying_goal: Set up CI to automatically update Databricks workspace Git folders to latest main branch whenever code is merged to main, force-overwriting any local changes on Databricks
friction_detail: User interrupted the first attempt, likely because Claude started exploring before the user finished providing context.
brief_summary: User wanted a CI pipeline to force-pull Databricks workspace repos on merge to main; Claude explored the codebase, gathered requirements, and produced a plan but session ended before implementation.
